F

findTweetsForAllStates() - Method in class TwitterMapper
Searches Twitter for tweets containing the keyword associated with this object in each of the 50 US states.
findTweetsForState(State) - Method in class TwitterMapper
Searches Twitter for the specified number of tweets (MAX_TWEETS_PER_STATE) containing the keyword associated with this object in the specified state.

G

getSentiment(String) - Method in class SentimentDictionary
Returns the sentiment associated with the specified word.

Returns the singleton instance of the SentimentDictionary.

Standard main method for the program.
mapSentimentForAllStates() - Method in class TwitterMapper
Generates an HTML file that visualizes the resulting average sentiments for each states as a choropleth representing the sentiment of the tweets in each state.

S

SentimentDictionary - Class in <Unnamed>
This class is a singleton that manages access to the sentiments dictionary.

T

Publishes the specified tweet from the account associated with this project.
TwitterMapper - Class in <Unnamed>
This class queries Twitter for tweets in a specific state that contain a specified keyword.
